{"step_by_step_thinking": "Tamoxifen is a selective estrogen receptor modulator used in the treatment of breast cancer. Terbutaline is a beta-2 adrenergic agonist used to delay premature labor. A copper intrauterine device is a form of birth control that can prevent pregnancy but it is not used to terminate an existing pregnancy. Mifepristone is a progesterone receptor antagonist that is used in combination with misoprostol to medically abort a pregnancy.", "answer_choice": "C. Mifepristone"}
